name: MISSTRETCH
description:
MISSTRETCH is an 8-bit styled action-platformer, where you navigate through deadly obstacles by careful self-extension and reduction. Too bad you can’t jump... 

Story

One starry night in the middle of a city, our hero Stretchy finds herself trapped in the bottom of a perplexing building called Video Tower. 

Sometimes the only way is up!

Features
  • stretching
  • dancing
  • short (game) length
Default Controls

Keyboard:

  • Arrow Keys - move
  • Z, X, C - stretch

Controller:

  • D-Pad - move
  • Face Buttons - stretch 
Additional Notes

MISSTRETCH by design lacks BGM for most of its runtime instead focusing on ambient noises and sound effects, however nothing is stopping you from listening to your own music while playing! Anything by Meiko Nakahara or casiopea should go well with the game, adding a unique city pop / jazz fusion flair befitting the urban environment you can see on the title screen.

Made with pico-8.
